articles.author: Andrew McDonald
articles.title: Rishi Sunak readies for battle over latest bid to stop cross-Channel migration - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: UK PM will unveil new laws this week to stop ‘small boats’ crossing the Channel — but faces huge battles in parliament and the courts.
articles.content: LONDON Rishi Sunak will this week unveil new plans to stop “small boats” crossing the English Channel but he faces a major fight in parliament and the courts to get them over the line anytime soon. … [+4162 chars]
